amendment.description: To provide an additional amount for the Department of Defense One Source counseling and referral hotline; and to provide an offset.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3289 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3289 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Kennedy. (consideration: CR S7152-7160) To provide an additional amount for the Department of Defense One Source counseling and referral hotline; and to provide an offset.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3289 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3289 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Kennedy.
